title: War of the Satellites (Horror, 1958) Dick Miller, Susan Cabot, Richard Devon | Movie

sources.title: War of the Satellites (Horror, 1958) Dick Miller, Susan Cabot, Richard Devon | Movie
sources.description:
An "unknown force" declares war against planet Earth when the United Nations disobeys warnings to cease and desist in its attempts at assembling the first satellite in the atmosphere.

Original title: War of the Satellites (1958)

Colorized version https://youtu.be/WK6HUh7FBUk


Director: Roger Corman
Writers: Irving Block, Lawrence L. Goldman
Stars: Dick Miller, Susan Cabot, Richard Devon, Eric Sinclair
Genre:  Classics, Cult Film, Horror, Thriller, Sci-Fi, Adventure 
Budget: $70,000

00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
06:50 Extraterrestrial beings send a warning message to Earth about pollution and isolation measures.
07:23 Extraterrestrial intelligence threatens Earth with a mysterious message, causing intrigue and volunteer missions.
12:09 Alien invasion threat unfolds as Dr. Van Ponder's death triggers unrestricted funding for Project Sigma.
17:34 Discussion about a looming extraterrestrial threat leads to a decision to surrender to an advanced alien race.
20:48 Intense discussion on survival and resistance in Project Sigma, followed by a radiation density test.
24:05 Intrigue unfolds as Dr. Lazar investigates a reactor incident, leading to a last-minute crew change for Rocket One.
31:26 Intense space mission leads to unexpected consequences and moral dilemmas.
41:41 A tragic mission unfolds in space, leading to a crew member's death and suspicion among the team.
44:56 Discovery of a mysterious impostor leads to a shocking revelation during a medical examination.
52:15 A mysterious threat endangers a space mission, leading to a desperate search for answers and a shocking revelation.
1:01:00 Interstellar mission successfully destroys enemy satellite, expanding universe's boundaries.

@CultCinemaClassics .
